content: sparkling scrubby creative bubble yarn 99 yd 1 scrubby takes 26 yds 5 0 mm h crochet hook scissors darning needle gauge not critical pattern round 1 work 8 half_double_crochet in a magic_ring slip_stitch into top of first half_double_crochet 8 note when working the corresponding st after the ch2 or ch1 work it immediately after the chain 2 or ch1 for all applicable rounds round 2 chain 2 does not count as a st here and throughout work 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 16 round 3 chain 2 *work 1 half_double_crochet in next st work 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 24 round 4 chain 2 *work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 sts work 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 32 round 5 chain 2 *work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 sts work 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 40 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch into first single_crochet 40 round 7 chain 2 work half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 40 round 8 chain 2 *work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 sts hdc2tog* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 32 round 9 chain 2 *1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 sts hdc2tog* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 24 round 10 chain 2 *half_double_crochet in next st hdc2tog* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 16 round 11 chain 2 work hdc2tog around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet 8 fasten_off leaving a 6 inch tail weave tail through the top loops of the 8 half_double_crochet and pull tight weave in the rest of the tail and the tail from beginning this pattern is for personal use only not for resale ©2021 unwind yarn shop llc all rights reserved 9912 e grand river brighton mi 810-229-5579 www unwindyarnshopmi com
